DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess safety of Omnipure inj. (lohexol) contrast media in CT scanning patients
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study to Assess the Safety of OmnipureÂ® Inj.(Iohexol) Contrast Media in CT Scanning Patients
DOC.criteria: subjects in need of CT scanning subjects who signed up informed consent Known allergy or hypersensitivity to the study medication, ingredient of the medication, and Iodine type medication severe renal insufficiency patients severe hypothyroidism severe local infection or bacteremia
